perturbation.original_text:
(b) Delivery. The Company shall use its commercially reasonable best
         --------
efforts to complete the design of the Manifest and the Service in a timely and
professional manner consistent with commercial software industry standards on or
before August 1, 1999 and deliver the URL and the access codes or passwords
necessary to use the Service to MBE and each subscribing MBE Center on or before
September 1, 1999.
perturbation.changed_text:
(b) Delivery. The Company shall use its commercially reasonable best
         --------
efforts to commence the design of the Manifest and the Service. There are no explicit deadlines. The delivery of the URL and the access codes or passwords necessary to use the Service to MBE and each subscribing MBE Center will depend on the availability of Company's resources.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets firm deadlines for completion and delivery. The modified text removes these deadlines, making the delivery schedule uncertain and dependent on resource availability. This creates a contradiction because other sections might rely on the initial firm deadlines, creating uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text:
(a) Updates and Service Revisions. The Company will make Updates to the
         -----------------------------Service in accordance with the requirements set forth in the Specifications at
no charge for the entire term of this Agreement. Without limiting the foregoing,
the Service shall be updated from time to time during the term of this Agreement
to include accurate and current (i) Listings and (ii) pricing and service
descriptions for each carrier supported by the Manifest, in each case as soon as
reasonably practicable following the receipt by the Company of such Listings,
pricing and service descriptions.
perturbation.changed_text: (a) Updates and Service Revisions. The Company may make Updates to the Service at its sole discretion. Nothing in this agreement requires the Company to provide the Updates. The Company shall update from time to time during the term of this Agreement to include accurate and current (i) Listings and (ii) pricing and service descriptions for each carrier supported by the Manifest, in each case as soon as reasonably practicable following the receipt by the Company of such Listings, pricing and service descriptions.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the Company 'will make Updates', implying an obligation. The modified text suggests that making updates is optional on the part of the Company, therefore creating a contradiction regarding the Company's obligations to maintain and update the service during the term.
